column1: But it should be kept in mind that the home visit, for reasons of either vocational guidance or after - care, was intended to do more than simply attend to the school - leaver, who was urged to ‘ put your shoulder to the wheel’ in order‘to reduce to a minimum the number of inefficient citizens’.
